forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain ending overnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain and windy at times early. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
